trans-unit.source: Specifies the layout of items in a list control.
trans-unit.target: 列表控件中指定项的布局。

trans-unit.source: The RepeatLayout enumeration represents the different layout options for a list control.
trans-unit.target: 适用枚举表示列表控件的不同的布局选项。

trans-unit.source: Items are displayed without a table structure.
trans-unit.target: 项目显示没有表结构。

trans-unit.source: Rendered markup consists of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""></xref> element and items are separated by <xref uid="langword_csharp_br" name="br" href=""></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 呈现的标记组成<xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""></xref>元素和项被隔离<xref uid="langword_csharp_br" name="br" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows markup that is rendered for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to Flow.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示为呈现的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为流。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Items are displayed without a table structure.
trans-unit.target: 项目显示没有表结构。

trans-unit.source: Rendered markup consists of an <xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""></xref> element that contains <xref uid="langword_csharp_li" name="li" href=""></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 呈现的标记组成<xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""></xref>包含的元素<xref uid="langword_csharp_li" name="li" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows markup that is rendered for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to OrderedList.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示为呈现的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为 OrderedList。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source:
```
``` > [!NOTE] > This field is new as of ASP.NET 4 and is a valid option only for the and controls.
trans-unit.target:
```
``` > [!NOTE]1> 此字段是自 ASP.NET 4 起，有效选项仅适用于和控件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Items are displayed in a table.
trans-unit.target: 项目显示在表中。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows markup that is rendered for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to Table.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示为呈现的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为表。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This option causes the control to render HTML that might not conform to accessibility standards.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此选项将导致控件呈现可能不符合辅助功能标准的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
